about_the_game:
Delve into the mystical depths of the Emerald Forest in this captivating roguelike. You play as a courageous fox, wielder of powerful spells, the ultimate bulwark against the growing corruption.

Lore:

The Emerald Forest, once a haven of peace and magic, is invaded by dark forces. As the darkness spreads, its guardians are dying out one by one. You, a fox with mystical powers inherited from the ancients, must restore harmony by fighting hordes of monsters and fearsome bosses.

Gameplay:

  • Roguelike Exploration: Each game is unique thanks to randomly generated levels filled with secrets to discover.

  • Magical Powers: Cast a variety of spells, from destructive ice spears to summoning ravens that defend you, to defeat your enemies and defend the forest.

  • Evolution and Customization: Improve your skills, your stats and create powerful magical synergies.

  • Strategic Combat: Face hordes of malevolent creatures and intimidating bosses with a combination of strategy and sharp reflexes.

Caracteristics:

  • Old School Visuals: Enchanting and immersive pixel art graphics paint a living forest, pulsating to the rhythm of your adventure.

  • Epic Soundtrack: Captivating orchestral music that evolves with your battles.

  • Progressive Challenges: Increasing difficulty and varied challenges to test your courage and ingenuity.

Embarquez pour une quête héroïque, sauvez la forêt d'Émeraude et devenez le gardien des légendes.
